XXbsu003_u:1: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharatisma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṅghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśarbhibhikṣuśataiḥ sambahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ //
XXbsu003_u:2: tatra khalu bhagavān mañjuśrīyāṃ kumārabhūtām āmantrayate sma /
XXbsu003_u:3: asti mañjuśrīrūpariṣṭāyām aparimitāguṇasañcayo nāma lokadhātustatrāparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorāja nāma tathāgato 'rhan
XXbsu003_u:4: samyaksambuddha eva hi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayati // 2 //
XXbsu003_u:5: śṛṇu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtā, ime jambudvipakā manuṣyā alpāyuṣkā
XXbsu003_u:7: ye khalu mañjuśrīḥ sattvastasyāparimitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya guṇavarṇaparikīrtana nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti nāmadheyamātram api śroṣyanti yāvat pustakagatām api kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiśca samantāt pūjābhiḥ pūjāyiṣyanti te parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ punaraiva varṣaśatāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu003_u:8: ye khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ sattvastasyāparimitāyurjñānasuviniścita tejorājasya tathāgatasya nāmoṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti, teṣām
XXbsu003_u:9: āyurvadhayiṣyanti, ye parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti teṣām apyāyurvivardhayiṣyati // 3 //
XXbsu003_u:10: tasmāttarhi mañjuśrīdirghāyuṣkatvaṃ prārthayitukāmaḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasyāparimitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti teṣām ime guṇānusaṃsā bhaviṣyanti // 4 //
XXbsu003_u:11: om namo bhagavate aparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāya, tadyathā, om puṇyamahāpuṇya aparimitāpuṇya
XXbsu003_u:14: imāṃ mañjuśrīstathāgatasya nāmoṣṭottaraśataṃ ye kecil likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti pustakagatām api kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti, te parikṣīṇāyuṣaḥ punaraiva varṣaśatāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti, itaścutvā aparimitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre upapadyante, aparimitāyuṣaśca bhaviṣyanti aparimitāguṇasañcaye lokadhātau // 6 //
XXbsu003_u:16: tena khalu punaḥ samayena navanavatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 7 //
XXbsu003_u:18: tena khalu punaḥ samayena caturaśītīnāṃ Buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 8 //
XXbsu003_u:20: tena khalu punaḥ samayena saptasaptatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 9
XXbsu003_u:22: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 10 //
XXbsu003_u:24: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcapañcaśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 11
XXbsu003_u:26: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcacatvāriśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 12
XXbsu003_u:28: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ṣaṭtriṃśatīnāṃ Buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 13 //
XXbsu003_u:30: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaviṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 14
XXbsu003_u:32: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 15
XXbsu003_u:34: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa na kadācinnarakeṣūpapadyate na tīryagyonau na yamaloke na akṣaṇeṣu ca kadācid api upapasyate /
XXbsu003_u:35: yatra yatra janmanyupapadyate, tatra tatra sarvatra jātau jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyanti // om namo bhagavate /
XXbsu003_u:36: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi likhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti // 18 //
XXbsu003_u:38: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasrāṇi kārāpitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti // 19 //
XXbsu003_u:40: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya pañcānantaryāṇi karmāvaraṇāni parikṣayaṃ gacchanti // 20 //
XXbsu003_u:42: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
XXbsu003_u:43: tasya na māro na mārakāyikā na yakṣa na rākṣasā nākālamṛtyurevatāraṃ lapsyante // 22 //
XXbsu003_u:45: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
XXbsu003_u:46: tasya maraṇakālasamaye navanavatayo buddhakoṭyaḥ sammukhaṃ darśanaṃ
XXbsu003_u:48: Buddhakṣetrādbuddhakṣetraṃ saṅkrāmati, nātra kāṅkṣā na vicikitsā na vimātirutpādayitavyā om namo bhagavate /
XXbsu003_u:49: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
XXbsu003_u:50: tasya catvāro mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddha rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyanti // om namo bhagavate /
XXbsu003_u:51: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau amitābhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre upapadyate
XXbsu003_u:53: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
XXbsu003_u:55: yeṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ mṛgapakṣīnāṃ karṇapuṭe nipatiṣyati te sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyak sambodhau abhisambodhim abhisambhotsyante // 26 //
XXbsu003_u:57: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya strībhāvo na kadācid api bhaviṣyati om namo bhagavate /
XXbsu003_u:58: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyam uddiśya ekam api kārṣāpaṇaṃ dānaṃ dāsyati, tena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati // 28 //
XXbsu003_u:60: ya idam dharmabhāṇakaṃ pūjayiṣyati, tena sakalasamāptaḥ saddharmaḥ pūjito bhavati // 29 //
XXbsu003_u:62: yathā vipaśviśikhiviśvabhukrakucchandakanakamunikāśyapaśākyamuniprabhṛtīnāṃ tathāgatānāṃ saptaratnamayaḥ pūjāḥ kṛtvā tasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ, na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum // 30 //
XXbsu003_u:64: yathā sumeroḥ parvatarājasya samānāṃ ratnarāśiṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt, tasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ, na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum om namo bhagavate /
XXbsu003_u:66: tatra ekaikavinduṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ, na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya
XXbsu003_u:69: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati saṃskṛtya pūjayiṣyati tena daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sarvatathāgatā vanditāḥ pūjitāśca bhaviṣyanti // 33 //
XXbsu003_u:72: dānabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 34 //
XXbsu003_u:74: śīlabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 35 //
XXbsu003_u:76: kṣāntibalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 36 //
XXbsu003_u:78: vīryabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 37 //
XXbsu003_u:80: dhyānabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 38 //
XXbsu003_u:82: prajñābalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 39 //
XXbsu003_u:84: idam vocadbhagavān āttamanaste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattva mahāsattvaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanam iti //
